On Wed, Mar 10, 2010 at 9:47 AM, David Saff <david@...> wrote:

> Or, by (almost) symmetry, the following?
>
> @Before public void...
> @After public void...
> @Rule public MethodRule...
>
> @BeforeClass public static void...
> @AfterClass public static void...
> @RuleOnClass public static ClassRule...
>
>
>
> In the end, though, my opinion of what is obvious is less important
> than y'all's. Chime in if you want to be heard.
>

Sounds like issue #29 @BeforeClass Rule:
http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues#issue/29

Please vote it up if you feel you need it. Which reminds me to pull from
latest master and re-apply my 'patch' so it can finally be properly
submitted with a pull request. :)

- a
